methods.name: setupPythonHomeDir
methods.comment: Sets up the python home directory.  This is the directory that has the "Lib" directory in it.

throws.comment: If there was a disk-related problem setting up the home directory.

methods.name: setupPythonCacheDir
methods.comment:
Sets up the python cache directory.  This is a temporary space that python source files
 get compiled to and cached.  It should NOT be in the Ghidra installation directory, because
 some installations will not have the appropriate directory permissions to create new files in.

params.name: monitor
params.comment: A monitor to use during the cache directory setup.

throws.comment: If the user cancelled the setup.
If there was a disk-related problem setting up the cache directory.
